channel.title: Tutorial

item.title: Tutorial
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Ok this is a tutorial that i didnt want too post in tutorial section XD so here
search for

/*PRAYER STUFF*/

then you should see this

public int currentpray = playerLevel[playerPrayer]; public int maxpray = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); public int PrayerDrain = 5; public int PrayerTimer = 10; public int NewDrain = 7; public boolean Str1 = true; public boolean Str2 = true; public boolean Str3 = true; public boolean Skin = true; public boolean Rock = true; public boolean Steel = true; public boolean Clarity = true; public boolean Reflex2 = true; public boolean Reflex3 = true; public boolean ProtItem = false; public boolean RapidRestore = true; public boolean RapidHeal = true; public boolean Retribution = true; public boolean Redemption = true; public boolean DrainPray = true; public boolean ProtMage = true; public boolean ProtRange = true; public boolean ProtMelee = true; public boolean Smite = true; public boolean Noprayer = true;

but the true will be false change all of the falses too true like mine
then scroll down a little then you should see this

public void ResetProtPrayers() { ProtMage = true; ProtRange = true; ProtMelee = true; Str1 = true; Str2 = true; Str3 = true; Skin = true; Rock = true; Steel = true; Clarity = true; Reflex2 = true; Reflex3 = true; ProtItem = true; RapidRestore = true; RapidHeal = true; Retribution = true; Redemption = true; }
I think they are all false if so change them just too like mine XD i dont know what this does i think it activates the prayer so it drops or something so its a idk tutorial but it seems too work

Read full topic
